author: Illustrious
content: Nothing beats the sweet fragrance of afternoon tea~

comments.content: ...Why are you lighting incense?

replies.content: Aromatherapy, of course. I heard it is perfect for relieving stress and improving one's mood. Would you like to try for yourself, Baltimore?
Stress relief, huh? I could use some of that...
Oh? Are you interested in aromatherapy too? I'd be glad to introduce you to all the different modalities and their applications!
Uhh, sounds good!

comments.content: Is this essential information for an idol? Should I have Warspite brief me upon this matter...?

replies.content: If you so desire, Your Majesty. Shall I make preparations for before the concert?
Shouldn't we plan it after an exercise or lesson?
Seems like we're a bit out of sync... in more ways than one.

comments.content: I thought the point was to reduce stress...

replies.content: Oh, Commander, you probably could benefit too~ I'll bring some to your room next time~

author: OutrangeTH
content: Hehehe... I'll capture Commander's heart with this secret song~♡

comments.content: Ooh, can I listen to it?

replies.content: This is for Commander's ears only! You, stay away!
When you put it like that, I only want to hear it even more~ What should I do~?
Hey... Don't get any weird ideas!

comments.content: Hmm? Were you having a secret recording session without telling me?

replies.content: This is a solo recording, so there's nothing in it for you! Besides, only Commander is worthy of listening to this... Ehehe...
Maybe I should do something solo as well~ Ahh, I wonder if I should give Commander a call~
Hmph. Don't miss the sound check. If you prevent Commander from enjoying my song...
Sure, sure~

comments.content: I hope the contents are safe for work...

replies.content: My dearest Commander~ Taihou's passion and love for you are nothing but pure~

author: Le.Triomphant
content: My wonderful sister is enjoying her break time.

comments.content: Triomphant?! When'd you take this?!

replies.content: It was time for our lesson, so imagine my surprise when I found you sound asleep!
I just happened to oversleep! Yeah, because I'm such a hard worker!
Jeez... You should take your job more seriously!
Look, the idol biz is tough stuff! Gotta rest properly, you know!

comments.content: you must've been really tired, cuz you missed out on Dunkerque's crullers

replies.content: Maybe this is a new Sleeping Idol project? If anyone could pull it off, it's her.
Eh? Such a thing exists? Tell me more!
Sounds interesting! Anything I can do to help?
What... did I just read...

comments.content: Le Mochi is cute.

replies.content: If you think so, then it falls upon me to deliver more sleeping faces... by sleeping.

comments.content: What about your lesson though?

replies.content: Uhh... work/leisure balance?

author: VivaLaze
content: This is cruel and unusual punishment...

comments.content: That's what you get for being late to the lesson. Besides, cleaning builds virtue!

replies.content: Le Triomphant, I thought you were supposed to be on my side...
Sorry, sis... But for the sake of you being able to shine on stage...

comments.content: Le Malin, you did a really good job! We really appreciate it!

replies.content: F-fine... I suppose this was the right thing to do...

comments.content: What a good girl. I'll make some more donuts for you.

replies.content: Eh?! Donuts?

comments.content: We told you it was a bad idea...

replies.content: I know, I know... But seriously, I just overslept...

comments.content: Wow, looks great. You should help me out too.

replies.content: You can't trick me with that sweet talk! I'm gonna sleep twice as long today!

author: Dido_Doll
content: Those without talent... simply have to work harder!

comments.content: You go, girl! I can't wait to see you onstage!

replies.content: That's just going to make me more nervous...
Just take a deep breath! Inhale! Exhale!

comments.content: The honourable Master is cheering for you as well, Dido!

replies.content: R-really...?
Indeed. You have the full support of me and the Royal Maids!
I am moved to tears by the overwhelming show of support for this unworthy maid...

comments.content: You've got this, Dido!

replies.content: Oh, Master! Thank you! I'll work harder, so... please look forward to my performance!

comments.content: Hope you're not pushing yourself too hard.

replies.content: Not at all...! As long as I think about you and the others, I feel like I can do anything!

author: Justice_B
content: So, I signed up because I heard there would be an "Idol Basketball Showdown," but I can't break any ankles in this outfit.

comments.content: You're not supposed to play hard. Just play cute.

replies.content: Play cute...? What does that even mean...

comments.content: Hah! It's not a showdown without two! How about it?

replies.content: Now we're talking! Grab Cleveland as well!
Wait, it won't be an idol activity anymore at that point...

comments.content: I like the sound of this. Count me in!

replies.content: The Polaris outfits are so much easier to move around in.
Hah, yeah... Might be a bit rough, but at least you look gorgeous!
Please don't make fun of me like that!

comments.content: Need to see more of this side of Balti.

replies.content: Huh? What side? Well, it's a good thing, right?

comments.content: Basketball-playing idols? That's a crossover I want to see.

replies.content: Right? If only I didn't have to wear this outfit...

author: RoonDESU
content: This newly released pudding is simply delectable~♡

comments.content: I was wondering where you dashed off to as soon as our rehearsal ended.

replies.content: Shall I bring you some as well, Taihou?
Sure, I'd appreciate it.
All right, you got it~

comments.content: DID SOMEONE SAY PUDDING? Ahh, but I'm so far away from a store...

replies.content: There's one not too far from the venue.

comments.content: Let's all go together next time~

replies.content: Please bring me someeeee~

comments.content: Maybe you all should make some sort of Foodie Club?

replies.content: Sounds fun, but I really just want to enjoy some smooth, creamy pudding.

comments.content: You really love pudding don't you, Roon?

replies.content: Yeah, but not as much as I love... sharing pudding with you~

author: Ташкент
content: I'm a terrifying bunny from the North! Rawrrrr!

comments.content: Rawrrr~

replies.content: Rawrrrrr~!!
Rawrrrrr~!!!
Rawrrrrrr~!!!!
STOP SPAMMING MY FEED
An overwhelming display of force... Truly impressive!

comments.content: Your stage outfit looks super cute!

replies.content: Is that so? It's certainly got that Northern Parliament energy, yeah?
That it does. But, there's still some room for improvement when it comes to the roaring.
...I see. I'll try to work on it.

comments.content: I don't think rabbits roar...

replies.content: This one does. Rawrrrr!!

comments.content: Rawr~!

replies.content: I see how it is! But I won't lose to you in a roar-off, dear comrade!

comments.content: Is it candy?!

replies.content: Nobody needs any more of your surprises, Albacore...
It's something perfectly normal this time! Trust me! I just can't tell you what's inside~☆
Is that so... Well, maybe I'll give it another chance.

comments.content: Why does my box look so weird compared to the others?

replies.content: That's because you're also weird~ ...Just kidding! I hope you enjoy what's inside!
...You're not going to fool me again!
C'monnnn~ We're friends now. Open it already~

comments.content: Woah, wonder what's inside?

replies.content: It wouldn't be a surprise if I told you. But don't worry, you're not missing out.

comments.content: I swear your "surprises" are more anxiety-inducing than enemy attacks.

replies.content: Eh? Do you think I'm that sus or something? I never hurt anyone~

author: OutrangeTH
content: Thank goodness, there really wasn't anything weird inside...

comments.content: Jeez, Taihou, you act like I regularly put weird things into boxes.

replies.content: You absolutely DO.
Fine, fine, I'm sorry! I swear I won't do it again ><
Nope, not buying it!

comments.content: Haha, you two seem to get along really well.

replies.content: Who could ever get along with a brat like her? Hmph!
How mean, Taihou~ Even after I sent you a postcard cheering you on~
Wow, Albacore, that looks cute. Did you draw that yourself?
Look, I appreciate it. Really.
Eheh~ You're welcome~♪

comments.content: I ship this.

replies.content: Aw shucks, Commander~ Not you too~

comments.content: You took a perfectly good Meowfficer, and look, it has anxiety!

replies.content: Eh, really? All I said was, "I'll help you return to the wild."
Return to the wild? You know, about the meowfficers...
Huh? I mean what I said...
This isn't getting anywhere...

comments.content: Considering the meowfficers don't seem to listen to anyone, Roon seems to have some unique abilities.

replies.content: But, I'm trying to smile as nicely as I can~

comments.content: Didn't you say you were coming back to rehearsal? Yet here you are playing with the animals...

replies.content: Heheh~ What can I say, I like cute things~♪
What... How did a meowfficer get here? I thought Akashi and the Commander were supposed to take care of them...
Commander? Is Commander coming?! Taihou wants to see you so!

comments.content: Should we take it over to Akashi?

replies.content: I'm sure Akashi won't mind if I keep this little guy a little longer...

comments.content: I'll take care of things.

replies.content: In that case, I'm coming to see you right now, Commander~♡

author: Justice_B
content: I'm not exactly your image of "a cute girl shining on stage," now am I?

comments.content: Of course you are, Baltimore! Well, I do know where you're coming from though, haha...

replies.content: Cleveland, you were always the model of "cool." Are you also into this cutesy stuff?
They're equally important! But, what's most important is that we all work hard, together.
Yeah... but I just hope I don't make an utter fool of myself and drag down the others...
Look, you're doing great out there. Believe in yourself!

comments.content: hmm... you do look a bit stiff though. remember, confidence is sexy!

replies.content: Sigh... If only you could lend me some of your appeal.
you've got that in spades already! now's your chance to show it off!

comments.content: Believe in the me that believes in you!

replies.content: Uh... I'm not sure I understand, but I'll try my best!

comments.content: I think you're doing great.

replies.content: Really? ...I'll take your word for it then.

author: Formidable
content: My dear sister at a recording session

comments.content: Formidable, did you take a picture of me? It's slightly embarrassing...

replies.content: But look how many shares this picture has gotten! People are loving the look!
Are you interested in the idol business as well, Formidable? I think you'd have a bright future as a rock musician.
I-I have no interest in that stuff at all!

comments.content: Sis, you look really focused...

replies.content: Unicorn, you have a pretty serious aura around you when you sing as well.
I can't hold a candle to you at all though >.<

comments.content: I'm hyped for your new release!

replies.content: I certainly do hope you enjoy it~

comments.content: Will you be doing a signing session afterwards?

replies.content: I'd be glad to~ Shall I stop by your office for something a bit more... personal?

comments.content: wew! tashkent is chuggin' like a champ!

replies.content: ...What the heck are you drinking?
...Water. Is there a problem?

comments.content: Thanks for coming to rehearsal today, Tashkent.

replies.content: You too, Illustrious. By the way, I had some difficulty following the choreography today...
Don't worry about it. Nothing some practice can't solve.
I see. Thanks, I'll keep that in mind.

comments.content: That's a very strange-looking water canteen.

replies.content: Is that so? ...It is what it is.

comments.content: Maybe we should set up a watering station next time.

replies.content: Yeah? Probably.

author: Dido_Doll
content: I worked my butt off today as well!

comments.content: Dido, I'm coming to cheer for you!

replies.content: Hermione... Sirius... Thank you for your support!
Everyone, including the Commander, was quite excited! Not a bad job you did, if I must say so myself!

comments.content: Yes, that is reflected in the merchandise sales.

replies.content: Merchandise...? What do you mean by that?
I have become such a big fan of yours that, uh...
She's been selling a bunch of merchandise supporting you!

comments.content: You still look like you're really embarrassed.

replies.content: Yeah, just thinking about everyone's eyes fixed upon me makes me nervous...
Well... that's part of what makes you cute, I guess.

comments.content: I loved hearing you sing.

replies.content: Ah... Master, I'll work even harder to improve for your sake!

comments.content: I agree. Very cute.

replies.content: C-cute? Ahh... I'm so happy I'm at a loss of words...

author: G_Albacore
content: Universe in Unison? More like Albacore in SPACE!!

comments.content: Eh?! You flew to the moon?

replies.content: With the power of the green screen! Can't let a perfectly good theme go to waste!
The stars and aliens are a good touch.
Zero gravity... means no more hard work... Now that's what I call heaven!
Hehe, can you imagine what it'd be like to actually live in space?

comments.content: I could never imagine being so far away from Master...

replies.content: I'm sure no distance could keep your feelings from being transmitted.
Really? Maybe I'll give it a shot then!

comments.content: Are you planning on holding a concert in space?

replies.content: Sure am! Gotta see how the aliens react!

comments.content: Just to be clear, nobody is actually going to space...

replies.content: You know what they say about landing among the stars, Commander! Go, go!
